sourcesContent: import NumberInput from '@Components/number-input' import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardBody, CardText, Label, FormGroup } from 'reactstrap' const NumberInputInline = () => { return ( Inline Use flex as wrapper to show Number Input as inline component ) } export default NumberInputInline
